ai-patthana15.54:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.54:0.3_0: Instead, they should developing the skillful qualities.
ai-patthana15.54:1.1_0: You should not give up the skillful qualities that should be given up by developing.
ai-patthana15.54:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.54:2.1_0: You should not give up the unskillful qualities that should be given up by developing.
ai-patthana15.54:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
ai-patthana15.54:3.1_0: You should not give up improper attention, following things that should be given up lack of developing, and cultivating the excessive outcome and result.
ai-patthana15.54:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
